name: Ruby Starcatcher Shawl
description:
The deep red color, richly beaded lace and dramatic scalloped edging conspire to make you the center of attention in this exotic shawl. It is shaped to hug your shoulders and sway glamorously as you dance the night away.

Size: Triangular with wings in front; 27” down the spine, 48” along top edge.

Materials: Alpaca/Silk blend laceweight and over 1650 8/0 seed beads.

Care: Hand wash and stretch out flat in shape to dry.

Free Shipping in Continental U.S.

name: Golden Leaflines Shawl
description:
This vibrant yellow leaf-shaped shawl features an intricate pattern reminiscent of the veins on leaves. It is the perfect accessory to wrap yourself in during Fall or any time you need a little warmth and comfort.

Size: Semicircular with points, 18" from top edge to center point, wingspan of 48".

Materials: Merino/Silk blend laceweight and 8/0 seed beads along the edges.

Care: Hand wash and stretch out flat in shape to dry.

Free Shipping in Continental U.S.

name: Iolite Spirals Scarf
description:
This versatile accessory in a deep purple jewel-tone can be wrapped around your shoulders or simply hung around your neck - the beaded spirals will garner you compliments either way.

Size: 47" x 7" Spiral Scarf 

Materials: Alpaca/Tencel blend laceweight and close to 300 beads.

Care: Hand wash and stretch out flat in shape to dry.

Free Shipping in Continental U.S.

name: Lilac Scalloped Capelet
description:
This lilac coverup can be pinned under the arms and in front to be worn as a sleeved capelet or worn as is to show off the bold lace pattern.  

Size: 3/4 circle of 18" radius.

Materials: Cotton/Wool blend fingering weight yarn and 6/0 seed beads.

Care: Hand wash and stretch out flat in shape to dry.

Free Shipping in Continental U.S.

name: Cloud and Raindrops Shawl
description:
This blue-gray cloud of lace is interspersed with beads glistening like raindrops throughout the shawl.

Size: Triangular; 56" across the top edge and 30" down the spine.

Materials: 100% Alpaca laceweight and over a thousand beads. 

Care: Hand wash and stretch out flat in shape to dry.

Free Shipping in Continental U.S.
